style: .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-container{--sf-gutter-x: 0rem;--sf-gutter-y:0;width:100%;padding:10% 0 5%;margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-recomm-section{padding-bottom:50px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-container *{box-sizing:border-box}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-row{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;margin-top:calc(-1 * var(--sf-gutter-y));margin-right:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x));margin-left:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x));max-width:100%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-equal-height [class*=sf-col-]{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-row.sf-equal-height,.sf-row.sf-equal-height .sf-row{height:auto}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-row>*{flex-shrink:0;width:100%;max-width:100%;padding-right:calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5);padding-left:calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5);margin-top:var(--sf-gutter-y)}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col{flex:1 0 0%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-1{flex:0 0 auto;width:8.33333333%;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-2{flex:0 0 auto;width:16.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-3{flex:0 0 auto;width:25%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-4{flex:0 0 auto;width:33.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-5{flex:0 0 auto;width:41.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-6{flex:0 0 auto;width:50%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-7{flex:0 0 auto;width:58.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-8{flex:0 0 auto;width:66.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-9{flex:0 0 auto;width:75%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-10{flex:0 0 auto;width:83.33333333%;margin-right:15px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-11{flex:0 0 auto;width:91.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-12{flex:0 0 auto;width:100%}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-flex{display:grid;grid-auto-flow:column;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-flex-column{flex-direction:column}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-align-center{align-items:center}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-self-align-end{justify-content:start;align-content:flex-end}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-text-center{text-align:center!important}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--sf-grid-count),calc((100% - 80px)/ var(--sf-grid-count)));align-content:center;column-gap:20px;row-gap:20px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-widget-title{width:100%;margin-top:unset;line-height:1.5;text-align:center;font-weight:500;overflow-wrap:break-word;font-size:24px;font-family:unset;text-align:center;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-image{transition:transform .3s ease-in-out;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0 auto;object-fit:cover;aspect-ratio:1}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-title{margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:5px;color:#000;word-wrap:break-word;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;line-height:1.5}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-price-container{line-height:1.5;display:flex;margin-top:50px;justify-content:flex-end;gap:10px;padding:0% 5% 0%;align-items:center;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-price{color:#000;margin-bottom:5px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-offer-price{color:red;margin-bottom:10px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-price-sub-container{font-size:14px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-add-on-product,.sf-this-product,.sf-total-price-container{font-weight:600}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-out-of-stock{display:none;background-color:grey!important;color:#fff!important;cursor:not-allowed!important;animation:none!important;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-variants-dropdown{background-image:none!important;font-family:inherit;cursor:pointer;display:block;width:100%;height:32px;color:#000;border:1px solid;background:0 0;padding:0 18px 0 8px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;font-weight:400;font-size:12px;line-height:20px;box-sizing:none;border-color:#e9ebec;color:#232323;margin-top:5px;border-radius:6px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-cart-container{margin:15px 0 0}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-variants-dropdown option{padding:5px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-link{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;overflow:hidden}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-item{display:flex;position:relative;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-item:not(:last-child){margin-right:20px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-plus-sign{font-size:24px}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-item:last-child .sf-plus-sign{display:none}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr)}}@media screen and (min-width:769px) and (max-width:1024px){.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr)}}@media screen and (min-width:1025px) and (max-width:1200px){.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr)}}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-brand-container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-top:40px} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-m-p5{margin: 0% 5% 0%;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-brand-container a{text-decoration:none;color:#6d7175}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-brand-content{font-weight:500}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-item:not(:last-child) .sf-product-image-container::after{content:"+";position:absolute;top:50%;right:-20px;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);font-size:16px;font-weight:600}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-image-container{position:relative;overflow:visible;}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-cart-loading::after{content:"";width:16px;height:16px;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin-left:10px;border:4px solid transparent;border-top-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;animation:button-loading-spinner 1s ease infinite}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-original-price{font-size:13px;padding-left:5px;font-weight:500}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-discount-text{padding-bottom:20px;font-size:13px;font-weight:500;text-align:center}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-checkbox-container{position:absolute;z-index:999;top:0;right:0px;cursor:pointer}.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-tot-price{font-size:16px} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-product-title{ font-size: 14px;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-product-variants-dropdown{height:25px; padding: 0px} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-price-container{margin-top:20px;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-price-sub-container{ font-size: 13px; } .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-tot-price{ font-size: 14px; } .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-original-price{padding:8px; font-size: 14px;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-discount-text{ font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 3px; margin-left: 5px;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-w-345 .sf-total-price{ margin-left: 5px;} .sf-modal{display:none;position:fixed;z-index:1;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.sf-modal-content{background-color:#fefefe;margin:15% auto;border:1px solid #888;width:65%;border-radius:10px;}.close{color:#aaa;float:right;font-size:24px;font-weight:700;padding:5px 10px 0px 0px;}.close:focus,.close:hover{color:#000;text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-discount{ display:none !important; } .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-onsale{ margin-right: 0px !important;} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-price-box{display:flex; flex-direction:row-reverse; gap:10px; justify-content: center} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-item:last-child::after{display:none} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-checkbox{ transform: scale(1.25)} @media screen and (max-width:767px){.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-col-12{flex:0 0 auto;width:83.33333333%} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-variants-dropdown{width:110px;}  .sf-modal-content{width:90%} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-total-price-container{margin-left: -5% !important;}} @media screen and (min-width:768px){.sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-container{padding-top: 4% !important} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-list{max-width:900px}} @media screen and (max-width: 375px){ .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-list{max-width: 285px; width:85%}} @media screen and (min-width:567px) and (max-width: 767px){ .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-product-list{ max-width:750px;width:100%} .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-total-price-container{max-width:inherit;}} @media screen and (min-width: 768px){ .sf-cross-sell-popup .sf-total-price-container{ margin-left: 0px; max-width:inherit;} }
